pageContext.claim: “Every day, 2,000 illegal aliens try to cross our borders. They try. We get most of them. It's hard without a wall.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump comes up with this figure by including people who are not trying to sneak across the border but present themselves to border authorities and are deemed inadmissible, which Homeland Security defines as: "individuals encountered at ports of entry who are seeking lawful admission into the United States but are determined to be inadmissible, individuals presenting themselves to seek humanitarian protection under our laws; and individuals who withdraw an application for admission and return to their countries of origin within a short timeframe."
